attributes.action: introduce penalties for those who play music out loud on public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Playing music through a mobile phones speakerphone on public transport is terribly anti-social. On the spot fines should be handed to those who choose to act in this anti-social manner.

We have all been there. Loud and often annoying music blaring from a mobile phone - it's incredibly annoying and something needs to be done as many people are often too scared to say anything. Fines need to be introduced to stamp this growing craze of playing music out loud from mobile phones.
